attributes.action: Drop all student debt incurred since the introduction of tuition fees in 1998 and immediately abolish all tuition fees in UK higher education
attributes.additional_details: We demand the forgiveness of all student debt incurred since the introduction of tuition fees in 1998 and the immediate abolition of all tuition fees in UK higher education. We regard not only those who are currently students within the higher and further education systems as exclusively members of the student movement, but also anyone who sympathizes with our aims and all those who have been hampered by student debte which frequently run into the tens of thousands of pounds. Their fight is our fight. End fees and end the disaster of student debt now.
